p: For the purposes of this paper, the model was calibrated to data from Zimbabwe. An approximate Bayesian computation 8 approach was used; this involves sampling model parameter values from various possible values, represented by prior distributions (see Data S2, Table 1) and assessing how closely the model outputs concur with observed data on the real‚Äêlife HIV epidemic and ART programme in Zimbabwe. Observed data were obtained from: ZIMPHIA 2, DHS 5, Global AIDS Response Progress Reports 9, WHO Resistance Report 10, Zimbabwe Ministry of Health 11, 12, published papers 13, 14 and UN Reports 15.
